SQL_STMT_U.val: select docentry,objtype from ODLN (NOLOCK) where (DocDate Between :1 and ':2') and docdate <= ':4' and (cardcode=':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' ='' ) and (doctype=':7' or ':7' is null or ':7' = '' ) and datasource='S' and docstatus = 'O' and (DocCur=':8' or ':8' is null or ':8' ='' ) and CANCELED = 'N' and CardName Like '%:9%' and (U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':10' or ':10' is null or ':10' ='' ) :3 :6

select docentry,objtype from ODLN (NOLOCK) where (DocDate Between :1 and ':2') and docdate <= ':4' and (cardcode=':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' ='' ) and (doctype=':7' or ':7' is null or ':7' = '' ) and datasource='S' and docstatus = 'O' and (DocCur=':8' or ':8' is null or ':8' ='' ) and CANCELED = 'N' and CardName Like '%:9%' and (U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':10' or ':10' is null or ':10' ='' ) :3 :6
